name: Lumberjacked. An interactive live action movie game App.
blurb: Lumberjacked is a new interactive game starring Dan The Beast Severn,  that puts you in the middle of a live action horror film.

rewards.reward:
THE GAME! 
You get the finished app once it's launched on iTunes (shooting for Sept/Oct). For the iPhone/iPad/iTouch. (If we meet secondary goals we hope to have it for Android phones also, stay tuned for updates). 

You also get a SHOUT OUT on our LUMBERJACKED Facebook fan page and a High-Res LUMBERJACKED wallpaper along with a virtual handshake and the slap on the back!

JACQUES LARACRUIX'S AX!!! That's right! The prop ax used in the film (don't worry mom, it's only a rubber ax). Own a piece of history and proudly display Jacques weapon of choice that he uses to slice and dice his victims. PLUS you get all the previous awards.\r\n(International shipping add $30)

STAR IN THE FILM!!!- Ready for your close up? BE IN THE GAME! We have written a special scene just for you. Be whacked sliced and diced by the lumberjack. Transportation and lodging is on you. PLUS all the previous awards!!!\r\n(International shipping add $10)

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER AND A LIFE SIZED HAND SCULPTED BUST OF JACQUES!!!!! - You will get your name in the credits before the film. All the perks of being a producer as listed under the $250 reward. PLUS a hand sculpted life bust of Jacques Laracruix done by the great Dan Phillips. Each one will be hand painted and is a one of a kind creation. PLUS everything we listed in the other rewards (except the starring role, but hey if you're rich why not buy both rewards?)  are yours. WOW.
